message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
Let's be fair, Alice.  We both get half.
You're getting a smaller share, Bob. Better take it now!
I'm willing to compromise, Alice. Let's split it 60/40.  We both get something, and we don't risk losing it all.
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it!
Alice, time is running out. I'm willing to take a smaller share, but we need to settle this. Let's split it 70/30.  It's the best we can do.
Last chance, Bob. Take it or walk away!
